content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I'm here to help you schedule a service appointment. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Mark! Can you please provide your address so I can confirm you’re within our service area?
Great, thank you! What type of service do you need help with—plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
I need someone to look at my AC. So, HVAC.
Thank you! When would be an ideal time for a technician to come out and take a look at your AC?
Honestly, I'm super busy this whole month. I just can't fit anything in right now.
I completely understand, Mark. If your schedule opens up or if you’d like to book a future appointment, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We’re here whenever you’re ready!
reason: Customer is too busy to schedule this month.
